Tag_Imageneed.description: ''[[The Lost Tales of Greece | Assassin's Creed: Odyssey – The Lost Tales of Greece]]''

MemoryInfobox.description: 'With Aletheia's guidance, Kassandra sought the three symbols that would unlock the Great Seal to Atlantis for the Layla Hassan|Heir of Memories, though she knew not who that was.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey – The Lost Tales of Greece'

General_Description: '''Three Symbols Entombed''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Following the information from [[Theras]], Kassandra traveled to three tombs through the Greek world in order to convey their locations to the [[Layla Hassan|Heir of Memories]], so she could uncover the symbols within when the time was right.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found the tombs of [[Agamemnon]], [[Eteokles]], and [[Orion]], and discovered the symbols to the [[Great Seal to Atlantis]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
